plot: Boycie's lost a satellite dish and Delboy's come into possession of one. Rodney goes to meet Cassandra at Gatwick Airport but her plane's been diverted to Manchester. Could there be a link connecting these events?

Rodney has been hitting the bottle and pulling sickies since his break-up with Cassandra, and needs to get back on track. Meanwhile, when Boycie's expensive super-size satellite dish goes missing from his garden, Del eyes an earner for himself if he can track it down and return it to Boycie intact. With Cassandra heading home from a Spanish holiday, will a now-reformed Rodney's plans for a happy reunion with her find her back on his wavelength?—stevecann2003
